title: Gangster who abducted own son killed during shootout with police
content: The gangster alias “Neelaka” who abducted a 7-year-old boy from Kandana area in Horana has been shot dead during a shootout with the police.The gangster had abducted his own son who was in the custody of the grandmother this morning (Feb. 17).“Neelaka”, who arrived at the house of the child’s grandmother, had shot in the air with a T-56 rifle before taking his own son away by force.
